- Changed screen to include title bar

Authorisation does not affect the actual task mode of the main screen
this screen contains only virtuals one of which has to be modified to
select other screens, all other fields are modifiable based on the
user rights
For use in subsequent programs
If only 1 currency used in schedule then store code else blank
Button labels

Check authorisation for OSP001C
Ranges for radio buttons
Clean up
In case of a cancel/rollback during online
WhatToDo 1-4, subsequent handling of schedule Invoice Entry/View
1 Multiple invoices per screen (Line mode)
2 Single invoice per screen (Screen mode)
3 All Invoices (overview)
4.Selected invoices
5 Errors only (overview)
Both call OSP004C with different preselected Ranges
All are followed by exit
If ComeBackWith = blank (forced exit) do not release schedule
Exit.. check ComeBackWith
O: Online
I: initialise
Schedule user only updated when user has modify rights
for either this program and/or OSP001C
Exit if another user is currently working on this schedule
Do not attempt to release lock (same user/different session could unlock!)
Else write temp STCY and go online
set lock handling

Call selected screen (outside of transaction)
Return online when done (to enter explanation)
Only update if user has modify rights
